description: Added close button for SeeksoAI. Modified searchbar appearance in hover or focus state. Adopted json structure for changelog. Optimized overall appearance of results page.
Added About Us page. Fixed issues with SeeksoAI display.
Updated web app with React + JS frontend and Python Flask backend. Introducing SeeksoAI, a search engine assistant powered by LLMs.
Brand-new user interface for Seekso.
Bug fixes for mobile platform.
New user-interface. New search bar redesign.
New theme. Infinite Search is now Seekso!
Added Google Analytics.
Added webkit support.
Changed search results interface, including font style, increased font size, and new button style at bottom of results.
Added box shadow for search bar and search button. Transition time for search bar set to 0.02s.
Lowered font size for trending box from 22px to 20px.
Lowered image resolution throughout our homepage for even faster loading speed.
Updated filter system. New 'Q&A' filter added to help search questions.
Introducing mobile version of Infinite Search. Favicon icon changed with new colors and rounded corners.
Added box shadow for all 'articles.' Resized text and spacing.
Changed CSS code for trending box and search button.
Added trending topics to homepage and search results page. Bug fixes and improvements.
Fixed bugs and other known issues.
New favicon updated, now with a blue-themed logo.

New layout for search results page. Navigation menu position fixed to top. New color changes for hover/active links and search button. New font family added for changelog page. Readjusted text alignment. Minor bug fixes and improvements.
Changelog box added to homepage. Minor formatting adjustments.
New layout for search bar. Added color change for hover and active links. Minor bug fixes and improvements.
Bug fixes. Resized search bar and results page.
Created homepage and search results page. Added logo and menu bars.
